name: XWUI Box Component
description: Basic layout container component with flexible styling options. Can be used as a generic container with customizable props including padding, margin, width, height, display type, and custom HTML element. Useful for creating flexible layout containers.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

as.description: HTML element tag name to render (e.g., 'div', 'section', 'article')

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the box

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

content.description: Content element or HTML string to display in the box

children.description: Children element or HTML string (alias for content)
